title: Ticket #5833: propage back to the submitter new job classads added to the routed job
description:
Hi,

in case there is no currently an alternative way that has the same effect, I would like to be able to inject new items to a job classad using one of the JobRouter hooks (ideally the TRANSLATE one, but the UPDATE one would also work), and propagate it back to the submitter. Idea is next time the end user runs command "condor_q -l" she can see the new classad in the output. Is this possible? Is it possible now?

Cheers, Jose
